name: 葛瑞斐
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills.
schedule:
1:  Introduction
2-5:  Principles to Live By
6-8: Twenty Questions
9:  MIDTERM
10-12:  In the News
13-15: Quotations
16-17:  Film and discussion
18:   FINAL
scorePolicy:
Midterm  33.3%
Final  33.3%
Participation  33.3%

Grading for midterm and final projects on will be based on criteria such as clarity, fluency, originality, and effort.
  a combination of 4 absences or late days =  -10 points from course grade
